properties.name: device
properties.description: Identifier of the device used for data collection

properties.name: filename
properties.description: The name of the data file, which likely includes the device ID and the timestamp of data collection

properties.name: cast_time_utc
properties.description: The time the data collection started in Coordinated Universal Time

properties.name: cast_time_local
properties.description: The time the data collection started in local time

properties.name: sample_type
properties.description: The type of data collected (Cast)

properties.name: cast_data
properties.description: Raw or processed data

properties.name: location_source
properties.description: The data source for location information (GPS)

properties.name: latitude_default
properties.description: A default latitude value used for reference

properties.name: altitude_default
properties.description: A default altitude value used for reference

properties.name: latitude_start
properties.description: The latitude at the start of the data collection

properties.name: longitude_start
properties.description: The longitude at the start of the data collection

properties.name: altitude_start
properties.description: The altitude at the start of the data collection

properties.name: gps_horizontal_error_start
properties.description: The horizontal accuracy of the GPS at the start of data collection

properties.name: gps_vertical_error_start
properties.description: The vertical accuracy of the GPS at the start of data collection

properties.name: gps_number_of_satellites_start
properties.description: The number of GPS satellites available at the start of data collection

properties.name: latitude_end
properties.description: The latitude at the end of the data collection

properties.name: longitude_end
properties.description: The longitude at the end of the data collection

properties.name: altitude_end
properties.description: The altitude at the end of the data collection

properties.name: gps_horizontal_error_end
properties.description: The horizontal accuracy of the GPS at the end of data collection

properties.name: gps_vertical_error_end
properties.description: The vertical accuracy of the GPS at the end of data collection

properties.name: gps_number_of_satellites_end
properties.description: The number of GPS satellites available at the end of data collection

properties.name: cast_duration
properties.description: The total duration of the data collection

properties.name: samples_per_second
properties.description: The sampling rate, indicating how many samples were taken per second

properties.name: electronics_calibration_date
properties.description: The date when the electronics were last calibrated

properties.name: conductivity_calibration_date
properties.description: The date when the conductivity sensor was last calibrated

properties.name: temperature_calibration_date
properties.description: The date when the temperature sensor was last calibrated

properties.name: pressure_calibration_date
properties.description: The date when the pressure sensor was last calibrated

properties.name: pressure
properties.description: The force exerted by the weight of the water column above the sensor

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The vertical distance below the water surface where measurements are taken

properties.name: temperature
properties.description: The measure of the water

properties.name: salinity
properties.description: The concentration of dissolved salts in the water
